text:
Supposely to be a "NO SMOKING" zone at this park. But we came across smokers (especially students and teenagers) smoking around the Futsal and BBQ area.

Nearby NPP police should patrol these areas more often as a deterrent and to enforce the "NO SMOKING" regulations in the park.
Taman Jurong Greens is located in Taman Jurong and is one of Singapore's oldest residential areas. Now, other than HD.
My kids love to play the playground. And for those who love jogging that is a best place if u have a kids
For an inline skater the place does not offer much but generally the place has alot of sports facilities and are usually packed with people.Lovely vibes there.

This is a very good park with running, jogging tracks and multi sports facilities. It is also equipped with gym equipment for workouts. These day's this park is getting popular and attracting neighbourhood crowd.
